options_nav_faq_label.description: Name of the options group for frequently asked questions

options_nav_faq_desc.message:
Do you protect my privacy?

Yes, you're safe. Even though the Web Store says that this extension could see your "browsing history", it does not. This is an open-source project whose source code is available for you to check. You can read my comments about privacy and the technical reasons why the Web Store is misleading.

You can also install a slightly less-featureful version of G+me: G+me (PARANOID Edition).

This extension slows down Google+

This is most likely because of incompatibility with other extensions. Try disabling all other Google+ extensions. Please let me know which extensions seem to interact badly with G+me, and I'll take a look at it.

This extension conflicts with other extension X

On August 2nd and 3rd, Google+ changed its layout, breaking almost all extensions. As a result, every extension had to change its code. It will take some time before I can restore compatibility with other extensions. Please be patient.

Will this be ported to Firefox or other browsers?

Once I've implemented other features, I plan to port to Firefox. But this could take a couple of weeks. Other browsers are not in the plans.
options_nav_faq_desc.description: Text of the Frequently Asked Questions

options_nav_problems_label.description: Name of the options group for problems

options_nav_problemsTroubleshoot.message:
In case of strange behavior, try the following:
  • Reload the page (the problem could just be Google+)
  • Restart your browser (the browser has bugs too)
  • Disable other Google+ extensions (the problem could be incompatibility)
  • Make sure you have the latest version of G+me. To check, right-click on the G+me browser icon, go to "Manage Extensions" and then compare with the latest version at the Web Store. Here's how to force extensions to update.
  • If you already have the latest version of G+me, you may try uninstalling and re-installing the extension.
  • You may try resetting all your options and history. See below.

options_nav_problemsFeedback.message: You can always ask questions and give feedback in the current discussion about G+me on Google+.
